trans-unit.source: Provides high-level access to the definition of a binding, which connects the properties of binding target objects (typically, WPF elements), and any data source (for example, a database, an XML file, or any object that contains data).
trans-unit.target: 提供繫結定義的高層級存取，連接繫結目標物件的屬性 (通常為 WPF 元素) 和任何資料來源 (例如資料庫、XML 檔案或任何包含資料的物件)。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding provides a simple and consistent way for applications to present and interact with data.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 資料繫結在資料的展示和互動上，提供應用程式簡單而一致的方式。

trans-unit.source: Data binding enables you to synchronize the values of the properties of two different objects.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結可讓您同步處理兩個不同物件的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: To establish a binding, use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> class or one of the other classes that inherit <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase>.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立的繫結，使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>類別或其中一個繼承的類別<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase>。

trans-unit.source: Regardless of what object you are binding and the nature of your data source, each binding follows the model illustrated by the following figure.
trans-unit.target: 不論什麼物件繫結，您的資料來源的本質，每個繫結會遵循模型，如下圖所示。

trans-unit.source: ![Basic data binding diagram](~/add/media/databindingmostbasic.png "Basic data binding diagram")
trans-unit.target: ![基本資料繫結圖表](~/add/media/databindingmostbasic.png "基本資料繫結圖表")

trans-unit.source: The figure demonstrates the following fundamental [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding concepts.
trans-unit.target: 此圖中會示範下列基本[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]資料繫結的概念。

trans-unit.source: Each binding typically has these four components: a binding target object, a target property, a binding source, and a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A> to the value in the binding source to use.
trans-unit.target: 每個繫結通常會有四個元件： 繫結目標物件、 目標屬性、 繫結來源和<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A>中要使用的繫結來源值。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to bind the content of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> to the Name property of an Employee object, your target object is the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>, the target property is the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text%2A> property, the value to use is Name, and the source object is the Employee object.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您想要繫結的內容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>Employee 物件的 Name 屬性，您的目標物件是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>，目標屬性是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text%2A>屬性，要使用的值是名稱，而來源物件是員工物件。

trans-unit.source: The target property must be a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 目標屬性必須是相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: This also means that you cannot bind a field.
trans-unit.target: 這也表示您無法繫結欄位。

trans-unit.source: Most properties of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects are dependency properties and most dependency properties, except read-only ones, support data binding by default.
trans-unit.target: 大部分屬性<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>物件是相依性屬性，大多數相依性屬性，唯讀的除了預設支援資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: (Only <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> types can define dependency properties and all <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects derive from <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>.)
trans-unit.target: (只有<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>類型可以定義相依性屬性以及所有<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>物件衍生自<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>。)

trans-unit.source: Although not specified in the figure, it should be noted that the binding source object is not restricted to being a custom [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] object.
trans-unit.target: 雖然圖中未指出，但應該注意的是，繫結來源物件不限於自訂的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] 物件。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding supports data in the form of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] objects and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 資料繫結支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] 物件和 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] 格式的資料。

trans-unit.source: To provide some examples, your binding source may be a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, any list object, a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] object that is associated with [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_adonet](~/includes/tlasharptla-adonet-md.md)] data or Web Services, or an XmlNode that contains your [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供一些範例，可能是繫結來源<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>，任何清單物件，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]與其相關聯物件[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_adonet](~/includes/tlasharptla-adonet-md.md)]資料、 Web 服務或 XmlNode，其中包含您[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]資料。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Mode%2A> property to specify the direction of the data flow.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Mode%2A>屬性，以指定資料流程的方向。

trans-unit.source: To detect source changes in one-way or two-way bindings, the source must implement a suitable property change notification mechanism such as <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>.
trans-unit.target: 若要偵測來源變更單向或雙向繫結中，來源必須實作適當的屬性變更通知機制例如<xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Implement Property Change Notification](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-property-change-notification.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱[How to： 實作屬性變更告知](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-property-change-notification.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A> property specifies the timing of source updates.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A>屬性會指定來源更新的時機。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see "Basic Data Binding Concepts" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 基本資料繫結概念 > 中[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。

trans-unit.target: *declaration*

trans-unit.target: 以逗號 （，） 分隔的零或多個屬性指派子句。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Binding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/binding-markup-extension.md) or [Binding Declarations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-declarations-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[繫結標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/binding-markup-extension.md)或[繫結宣告概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-declarations-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.Binding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.Binding" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.Binding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.Binding" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The initial <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path" /> for the binding.
trans-unit.target: 初始 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path" /> 來繫結。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.Binding" /> class with an initial path.
trans-unit.target: 使用初始路徑，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.Binding" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that listens to the event.
trans-unit.target: 接聽這個事件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The handler to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Adds a handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.Binding.SourceUpdated" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 加入 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.Binding.SourceUpdated" /> 附加事件的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This method supports attached event usage in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這個方法支援附加的事件的使用中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that listens to the event.
trans-unit.target: 接聽這個事件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The handler to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Adds a handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.Binding.TargetUpdated" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 加入 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.Binding.TargetUpdated" /> 附加事件的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This method supports attached event usage in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這個方法支援附加的事件的使用中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets opaque data passed to the asynchronous data dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定傳遞至非同步資料發送器的不透明資料。

trans-unit.source: Data passed to the asynchronous data dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞至非同步資料發送器的資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to evaluate the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path" /> relative to the data item or the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否評估與資料項目或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider" /> 物件相對的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to evaluate the path relative to the data item itself; otherwise, <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> 表示評估與資料項目本身相對的路徑；否則為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The normal behavior (when this property is `false`) includes special treatment for <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider> objects.
trans-unit.target: 正常行為 (當這個屬性是`false`) 包含特殊處理方式<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider>物件。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the binding engine evaluates the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A> relative to the object obtained from the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，繫結引擎會評估<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A>相對於物件取自<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the binding listens for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DataChanged> event and reacts accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 此外，繫結會接聽<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DataChanged>事件並據以回應。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `true` overrides this behavior and gives the binding access to properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider> object itself.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性設定為`true`會覆寫此行為，並提供繫結存取屬性<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider>物件本身。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the converter to use.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要使用的轉換子。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter" />.
trans-unit.target: 型別 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A binding implicitly uses a default converter that tries to do a type conversion between the source value and the target value.
trans-unit.target: 繫結，會隱含地使用嘗試執行類型轉換的來源值與目標值之間的預設轉換子。

trans-unit.source: If a conversion cannot be made, the default converter returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果無法進行轉換，預設轉換器會傳回 `null`。

trans-unit.source: If you want to associate a custom value converter with a binding, you should create a class that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter> interface and supply implementations for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要與繫結產生關聯的自訂值轉換器，您應該建立一個類別，實作<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter>介面，並提供實作<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Value converters can change data from one type to another, translate between cultural details such as character sets, or modify other aspects of their presentation.
trans-unit.target: 值轉換器可以將資料從一個類型變更為另一個、 翻譯文化特性的詳細資料，例如字元集，或修改其簡報的其他層面。

trans-unit.source: For examples of typical conversion scenarios, see "Data Conversion" in the [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 一般轉換案例的範例，請參閱 「 資料轉換 」，在[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *myConverter*
trans-unit.target: *myConverter*

trans-unit.source: A resource reference to a class that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter> interface, which includes implementations of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 實作的類別資源參考<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter>介面，其中包含實作<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To refer to a value converter, use the [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要參考的值轉換器，請使用[StaticResource 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the culture in which to evaluate the converter.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定文化特性，藉以評估轉換器。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set this property, the binding engine uses the `Language` property of the binding target object.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未設定這個屬性，就會使用繫結引擎`Language`繫結目標物件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] this defaults to "en-US" or inherits the value from the root element (or any element) of the page, if one has been explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]這預設為"EN-US"或繼承自 頁面上，根項目 （或任何項目） 的值，如果其中一個已明確設定。

trans-unit.source: For information about data conversion, see the Data Conversion section in the [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 資料轉換的相關資訊，請參閱中的資料轉換 」 一節[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the parameter to pass to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要傳遞至 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter" /> 的參數。

trans-unit.source: The parameter to pass to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter" />.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞至 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter" /> 的參數。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ConverterParameter%2A> property to specify how an object is converted.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ConverterParameter%2A>屬性來指定物件轉換的方式。

trans-unit.source: This property passes additional information to a converter that you use on a binding.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會將其他資訊傳遞至您的繫結使用的轉換器。

trans-unit.source: When you specify a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ConverterParameter%2A>, the value is passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A> methods as the `parameter` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ConverterParameter%2A>，值會傳遞至<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A>方法`parameter`參數。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Produce a Value Based on a List of Bound Items](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-produce-a-value-based-on-a-list-of-bound-items.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 產生清單的繫結項目值以](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-produce-a-value-based-on-a-list-of-bound-items.md)。

trans-unit.source: That example shows an implementation of an <xref:System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter> but the usage still applies.
trans-unit.target: 該範例會示範實作<xref:System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter>但仍適用於使用方式。

trans-unit.source: Used as a returned value to instruct the binding engine not to perform any action.
trans-unit.target: 作為傳回值，指示繫結引擎不要執行任何動作。

trans-unit.source: A binding source property or a converter can return <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.DoNothing?displayProperty=nameWithType> to instruct the binding engine not to perform any action.
trans-unit.target: 繫結來源屬性或轉換子可以傳回<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.DoNothing?displayProperty=nameWithType>，指示繫結引擎不要執行任何動作。

trans-unit.source: For example, to instruct the binding engine not to transfer a value to the binding target, not to move to the next <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> in a <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>, or not to use the `FallBackValue` or default value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要指示繫結引擎不要傳輸繫結目標時，不將移至下一個值<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>中<xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>，或不使用`FallBackValue`或預設值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the element to use as the binding source object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要作為繫結來源物件的項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see langword="Name" /> property or [x:Name Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md) of the element of interest.
trans-unit.target: 值<see langword="Name" />屬性或[X:name 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md)感興趣的項目。

trans-unit.source: You can refer to elements in code only if they are registered to the appropriate <see cref="T:System.Windows.NameScope" /> through <see langword="RegisterName" />.
trans-unit.target: 僅當程式碼中的項目透過 <see langword="RegisterName" /> 登錄為適當的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.NameScope" />，您才可以對其參考。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md)。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when you want to bind to the property of another element in your application.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要繫結至應用程式中的另一個項目的屬性，這個屬性是很有用。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> to control the height of another control in your application, or if you want to bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> of your control to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedValue%2A> property of your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您想要使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>來控制應用程式中的另一個控制項的高度或如果您想要繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>至控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedValue%2A>屬性您<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: By default, bindings inherit the data context specified by the `DataContext` property, if one has been set.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，繫結繼承所指定的資料內容`DataContext`如果其中一個已設定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A> property is one of the ways you can explicitly set the source of a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> and override the inherited data context.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A>屬性是一種方式，您可以明確設定的來源<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>並覆寫繼承的資料內容。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Specify the Binding Source](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-specify-the-binding-source.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 指定的繫結來源](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-specify-the-binding-source.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> class also enable you to set the source of the binding explicitly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>類別也可讓您設定的繫結來源明確。

trans-unit.source: However, only one of the three properties, <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A>, should be set for each binding, or a conflict might occur.
trans-unit.target: 不過，只有三個屬性，其中<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A>、 應該設定為每個繫結，或可能會發生衝突。

trans-unit.source: This property throws an exception if there is a binding source conflict.
trans-unit.target: 如果繫結來源衝突，則這個屬性會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The object from which to get namespace information.
trans-unit.target: 要從中取得命名空間資訊的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] namespace manager object used by the binding attached to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回附加至指定物件之繫結所使用的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] 命名空間管理員物件。

trans-unit.source: A returned object used for viewing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] namespaces that relate to the binding on the passed object element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回物件，用來檢視所傳遞物件項目的繫結相關的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] 命名空間。

trans-unit.source: This object should be cast as <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件應轉型為 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager" />。

trans-unit.source: This method supports attached property usage for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.XmlNamespaceManager%2A> attached property.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法支援附加的屬性的使用方式的<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.XmlNamespaceManager%2A>附加屬性。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] namespace managers are relevant only if the data in the binding came from an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] binding source (<xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider> object).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] 命名空間管理員才有意義的資料繫結中來自[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]繫結來源 (<xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>物件)。

trans-unit.source: If a namespace manager was not specifically applied either in the original data source creation or by subsequently calling <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.SetXmlNamespaceManager%2A> on the binding, then this method will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果命名空間管理員沒有特別套用在原始資料來源建立或由後續呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.SetXmlNamespaceManager%2A>的繫結，則這個方法將傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: This method will always return `null` if the data behind the binding is not [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這個方法一律會傳回`null`如果繫結背後的資料不是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> parameter cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 參數不可為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Used as the <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs.PropertyName" /> of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs" /> to indicate that an indexer property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 做為 <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs.PropertyName" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs" />，表示索引子屬性已變更。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.Binding" /> should get and set values asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.Binding" /> 是否應非同步取得及設定值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.IsAsync%2A> property when the `get` accessor of your binding source property might take a long time.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.IsAsync%2A>屬性時`get`存取子，您的繫結來源屬性可能需要很長的時間。

trans-unit.source: One example is an image property with a `get` accessor that downloads from the Web.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個範例是以影像屬性`get`從網路下載的存取子。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.IsAsync%2A> to `true` avoids blocking the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] while the download occurs.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.IsAsync%2A>至`true`可避免[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]下載進行時。

trans-unit.source: While waiting for the value to arrive, the binding reports the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue%2A>, if one is available, or the default value of the binding target property.
trans-unit.target: 繫結會等待到達的值，報告<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue%2A>，如果有的話，或預設值繫結的目標屬性。

trans-unit.source: However, there should not be many scenarios where you need to use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.IsAsync%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 不過，不應該有許多案例中您需要使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.IsAsync%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_net](~/includes/tla2sharptla-net-md.md)] guidelines recommend against defining properties that are orders of magnitude slower than a field set would be.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_net](~/includes/tla2sharptla-net-md.md)]指導方針，建議您不要定義速度較慢比欄位集的屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you are creating your class, consider handling extremely slow operations outside of the `get` accessor and caching the result.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立您的類別時，請考慮將處理的速度非常慢作業之外的`get`存取子和快取結果。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Choosing Between Properties and Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/55825e8f-7e2e-448a-9505-7217cc91b1af).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 選擇之間指定屬性和方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/55825e8f-7e2e-448a-9505-7217cc91b1af)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the direction of the data flow in the binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示繫結中資料流程的方向。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.Default" />, which returns the default binding mode value of the target dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<see cref="F:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.Default" />，它會傳回目標相依性屬性的預設繫結模式值。

trans-unit.source: However, the default value varies for each dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 不過，每個相依性屬性的預設值都會不同。

trans-unit.source: In general, user-editable control properties, such as those of text boxes and check boxes, default to two-way bindings, whereas most other properties default to one-way bindings.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，使用者可編輯的控制項屬性 (例如文字方塊和核取方塊的控制項屬性) 預設為雙向繫結，而其他大多數屬性則預設為單向繫結。

trans-unit.source: A programmatic way to determine whether a dependency property binds one-way or two-way by default is to get the property metadata of the property using <see cref="M:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.GetMetadata(System.Type)" /> and then check the Boolean value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.BindsTwoWayByDefault" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 判斷相依性屬性預設是否會單向或雙向繫結的程式設計方式是，使用 <see cref="M:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.GetMetadata(System.Type)" /> 取得屬性的屬性中繼資料，然後檢查 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.BindsTwoWayByDefault" /> 屬性的布林值。

trans-unit.source: To support <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.OneWay> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.TwoWay> bindings, the underlying data must implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>.
trans-unit.target: 若要支援<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.OneWay>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.TwoWay>基礎資料繫結必須實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [How to: Implement Property Change Notification](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-property-change-notification.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 實作屬性變更告知](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-property-change-notification.md)。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.TwoWay> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.OneWayToSource> bindings, you can control the target-to-source updates by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.TwoWay>或<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.OneWayToSource>繫結，您可以設定來控制目標到來源更新<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the different binding modes, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關不同的繫結模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to raise the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.Binding.SourceUpdated" /> event when a value is transferred from the binding target to the binding source.
trans-unit.target: 當值從繫結目標轉送到繫結來源時，取得或設定指出是否引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.Binding.SourceUpdated" /> 事件的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.Binding.SourceUpdated" /> event should be raised when the binding source value is updated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果<see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.Binding.SourceUpdated" />更新，否則繫結來源值時，應該引發事件<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to raise the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.Binding.TargetUpdated" /> event when a value is transferred from the binding source to the binding target.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出將值從繫結來源轉送到繫結目標時，是否引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.Binding.TargetUpdated" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.Binding.TargetUpdated" /> event should be raised when the binding target value is updated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果<see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.Binding.TargetUpdated" />更新，否則繫結目標值時，應該引發事件<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to raise the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error" /> attached event on the bound object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值指出是否要在繫結物件上引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error" /> 附加事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error" /> attached event should be raised on the bound object when there is a validation error during source updates; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果<see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error" />附加的事件應該在來源更新期間驗證錯誤時在繫結物件上引發，否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the binding has <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A> associated with it, the binding engine checks each rule each time it transfers the target property value to the source property.
trans-unit.target: 如果繫結具有<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>與它相關聯，繫結引擎會檢查每個規則，每次傳輸來源屬性的目標屬性值。

trans-unit.source: If a rule invalidates a value, the binding engine creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError> object and adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation>.<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors%2A>
trans-unit.target: 如果規則導致無效的值，就會建立繫結引擎<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError>物件，並將它加入至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation>。<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors%2A>

trans-unit.source: collection of the bound object.
trans-unit.target: 繫結物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is not empty, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached property of the object is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性不是空的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加的屬性的物件設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.NotifyOnValidationError%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> is set to `true`, then the binding engine raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event on the object.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.NotifyOnValidationError%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>設`true`，然後繫結引擎引發<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加物件上的事件。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed discussion of the validation process, see the Data Validation section in the [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 驗證程序的詳細討論，請參閱中的資料驗證一節[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to the binding source property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定繫結來源屬性的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path to the binding source.
trans-unit.target: 繫結來源的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Each binding typically has these four components: a binding target object, a target property, a binding source, and a path to the value in the binding source to use.
trans-unit.target: 每個繫結通常會有四個元件： 繫結目標物件、 目標屬性、 繫結來源、 和中要使用的繫結來源值的路徑。

trans-unit.source: For more information about these data binding concepts, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關這些資料繫結概念的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A> property to specify the source value you want to bind to:
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A>屬性來指定您想要繫結來源值：

trans-unit.source: In the simplest case, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A> property value is the name of the property of the source object to use for the binding, such as `Path=PropertyName`.
trans-unit.target: 在最簡單的情況下，<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A>屬性值是使用繫結，例如來源物件的屬性名稱`Path=PropertyName`。

trans-unit.source: Subproperties of a property can be specified by a syntax similar to that used in C#.
trans-unit.target: 子屬性的屬性可以指定類似在 C# 中使用的語法。

trans-unit.source: For instance, the clause `Path=ShoppingCart.Order` sets the binding to the subproperty `Order` of the object or property `ShoppingCart`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，子句 `Path=ShoppingCart.Order` 會將繫結設定為物件或屬性 `ShoppingCart` 的子屬性 `Order`。

trans-unit.source: To bind to an attached property, place parentheses around the attached property.
trans-unit.target: 若要繫結至附加屬性，請在附加屬性前後加上括號。

trans-unit.source: For example, to bind to the attached property <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel.Dock%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the syntax is `Path=(DockPanel.Dock)`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要附加的屬性繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel.Dock%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，語法是`Path=(DockPanel.Dock)`。

trans-unit.source: Indexers of a property can be specified within square brackets following the property name where the indexer is applied.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的索引子可以在方括弧內指定，接在套用索引子的屬性名稱後面。

trans-unit.source: For instance, the clause `Path=ShoppingCart[0]` sets the binding to the index that corresponds to how your property's internal indexing handles the literal string "0".
trans-unit.target: 例如，子句 `Path=ShoppingCart[0]` 會將繫結設定為索引，而該索引對應於屬性之內部索引處理常值字串 "0" 的方式。

trans-unit.source: Multiple indexers are also supported.
trans-unit.target: 也支援多個索引子。

trans-unit.source: Indexers and subproperties can be mixed in a `Path` clause; for example, `Path=ShoppingCart.ShippingInfo[MailingAddress,Street].`
trans-unit.target: `Path` 子句中可以混合使用索引子和子屬性；例如，`Path=ShoppingCart.ShippingInfo[MailingAddress,Street].`

trans-unit.source: Inside indexers you can have multiple indexer parameters separated by commas (,).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在索引子內加入多個以逗號 (,) 分隔的索引子參數。

trans-unit.source: The type of each parameter can be specified with parentheses.
trans-unit.target: 各個參數的型別可以使用括號指定。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can have `Path="[(sys:Int32)42,(sys:Int32)24]"`, where `sys` is mapped to the `System` namespace.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以加入 `Path="[(sys:Int32)42,(sys:Int32)24]"`，其中 `sys` 對應至 `System` 命名空間。

trans-unit.source: When the source is a collection view, the current item can be specified with a slash (/).
trans-unit.target: 當來源為集合檢視時，就可以使用斜線 (/) 指定目前的項目。

trans-unit.source: For example, the clause `Path=/` sets the binding to the current item in the view.
trans-unit.target: 例如，子句 `Path=/` 會將繫結設定為檢視中目前的項目。

trans-unit.source: When the source is a collection, this syntax specifies the current item of the default collection view.
trans-unit.target: 如果來源為集合，這個語法就會指定預設集合檢視目前的項目。

trans-unit.source: Property names and slashes can be combined to traverse properties that are collections.
trans-unit.target: 屬性名稱和斜線可以組合用來周遊本身為集合的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, `Path=/Offices/ManagerName` specifies the current item of the source collection, which contains an `Offices` property that is also a collection.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`Path=/Offices/ManagerName` 會指定來源集合目前的項目，其中包含同樣為集合的 `Offices` 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Its current item is an object that contains a `ManagerName` property.
trans-unit.target: 其目前項目為包含 `ManagerName` 屬性的物件。

trans-unit.source: Optionally, a period (.) path can be used to bind to the current source.
trans-unit.target: 另外，可以使用句號 (.) 路徑來繫結至目前的來源。

trans-unit.source: For example, `Text="{Binding}"` is equivalent to `Text="{Binding Path=.}"`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`Text="{Binding}"` 等於 `Text="{Binding Path=.}"`。

trans-unit.source: For information about path syntax, see [Binding Declarations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-declarations-overview.md) or [PropertyPath XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/propertypath-xaml-syntax.md).
trans-unit.target: 路徑語法的詳細資訊，請參閱[繫結宣告概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-declarations-overview.md)或[PropertyPath XAML 語法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/propertypath-xaml-syntax.md)。

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] bindings, see the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.XPath%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]繫結，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.XPath%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To bind to an entire object, you do not need to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要繫結至整個物件時，您不需要指定<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see "Specifying the Path to the Value" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 指定的路徑以值"中[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a style trigger that creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> that reports a validation error message.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範建立樣式觸發程序<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>，報告驗證錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The value of the setter binds to the error content of the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> (the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> using the style) using the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Setter 的值會繫結至目前的錯誤內容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>(<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>使用樣式) 使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the binding source by specifying its location relative to the position of the binding target.
trans-unit.target: 透過指定繫結來源對繫結目標的相對位置，取得或設定繫結來源。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" /> object specifying the relative location of the binding source to use.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" />物件，指定要使用的繫結來源相對位置。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to bind one property of an object to another property of the same object, or to define a binding in a style or template.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性常用物件的一個屬性繫結至相同的物件，另一個屬性，或在樣式或範本中定義的繫結。

trans-unit.source: By default, bindings inherit the data context specified by the `DataContext` property, if one has been set.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，繫結繼承所指定的資料內容`DataContext`如果其中一個已設定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A> property is one of the ways you can explicitly set the source of a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> and override the inherited data context.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A>屬性是一種方式，您可以明確設定的來源<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>並覆寫繼承的資料內容。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Specify the Binding Source](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-specify-the-binding-source.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 指定的繫結來源](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-specify-the-binding-source.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties also enable you to set the source of the binding explicitly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性也可讓您設定的繫結來源明確。

trans-unit.source: However, only one of the three properties, <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A>, should be set for each binding, or a conflict can occur.
trans-unit.target: 不過，只有三個屬性，其中<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A>、 應該設定為每個繫結，或可能會發生衝突。

trans-unit.source: This property throws an exception if there is a binding source conflict.
trans-unit.target: 如果繫結來源衝突，則這個屬性會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md).
trans-unit.target: 如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱[RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object to use as the binding source.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要作為繫結來源的物件。

trans-unit.source: The object to use as the binding source.
trans-unit.target: 要作為繫結來源的物件。

trans-unit.source: By default, bindings inherit the data context specified by the `DataContext` property, if one has been set.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，繫結繼承所指定的資料內容`DataContext`如果其中一個已設定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A> property is one of the ways you can explicitly set the source of a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> and override the inherited data context.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A>屬性是一種方式，您可以明確設定的來源<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>並覆寫繼承的資料內容。

trans-unit.source: If you do not need the functionality of establishing a scope in which several properties inherit the same data context, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A> property instead of the `DataContext` property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不需要的功能建立的執行範圍的數個屬性繼承相同的資料內容，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A>屬性而非`DataContext`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties also enable you to set the source of the binding explicitly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性也可讓您設定的繫結來源明確。

trans-unit.source: However, only one of the three properties, <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A>, should be set for each binding, or a conflict can occur.
trans-unit.target: 不過，只有三個屬性，其中<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A>、 應該設定為每個繫結，或可能會發生衝突。

trans-unit.source: This property throws an exception if there is a binding source conflict.
trans-unit.target: 如果繫結來源衝突，則這個屬性會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To clear this property, set it to <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 若要清除此屬性，將它設定為<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *object*
trans-unit.target: *object*

trans-unit.source: An existing object.
trans-unit.target: 現有的物件。

trans-unit.source: To refer to an existing object, use the [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md)
trans-unit.target: 若要參考現有的物件，使用[StaticResource 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md)

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a `Person` object with a string property named `PersonName` that is defined in the `SDKSample` namespace, as the first highlighted line shows.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用`Person`物件具有名為字串屬性`PersonName`集中定義的`SDKSample`命名空間中的，第一個反白顯示的列所示。

trans-unit.source: In the highlighted line that contains the `<src>` element, it instantiates the `Person` object with a `PersonName` property value of `Joe`.
trans-unit.target: 在反白顯示列，其中包含`<src>`項目，它會具現化`Person`物件`PersonName`屬性值為`Joe`。

trans-unit.source: This is done in the `Resources` section and assigned an `x:Key`.
trans-unit.target: 這是`Resources`區段，並指派`x:Key`。

trans-unit.source: The highlighted line that contains the `<TextBlock>` elements shows how to bind to the `PersonName` property.
trans-unit.target: 包含反白顯示的列`<TextBlock>`項目示範如何將繫結至`PersonName`屬性。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> control appears with the value "Joe".
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>控制項就會出現 「 Joe"的值。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A> values of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> objects are set to the `static` property <xref:System.Windows.Application.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>:
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A>值<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>物件都會設為`static`屬性<xref:System.Windows.Application.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>:

trans-unit.source: For the full example, see [Data Binding Demo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703).
trans-unit.target: 如需完整範例，請參閱[資料繫結示範](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.Binding.SourceUpdated" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.Binding.SourceUpdated" /> 附加事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.Binding.TargetUpdated" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.Binding.TargetUpdated" /> 附加事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a handler you can use to provide custom logic for handling exceptions that the binding engine encounters during the update of the binding source value.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定可用來提供自訂邏輯的處理常式，以處理繫結引擎在更新繫結來源值期間所遇到的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This is only applicable if you have associated an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule" /> with your binding.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule" /> 已經與繫結相關聯時，這個屬性才適用。

trans-unit.source: A method that provides custom logic for handling exceptions that the binding engine encounters during the update of the binding source value.
trans-unit.target: 提供自訂邏輯以處理繫結引擎在更新繫結來源值期間所遇到之例外狀況的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule> is a built-in validation rule that checks for exceptions thrown during the update of the binding source property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>是內建的驗證規則會檢查繫結來源屬性更新期間擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If you have associated the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule> with your <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> object, you can use this property to set a handler to provide custom logic for handling these exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>與您<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>物件，您可以使用這個屬性設定來提供自訂邏輯以處理這些例外狀況處理常式。

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceExceptionFilter%2A> is not specified on the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>, the binding engine creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError> with the exception and adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection of the bound element.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceExceptionFilter%2A>上未指定<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>，建立繫結引擎<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError>與例外狀況並將它加入<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>繫結項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text%2A> property of the following <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> is data-bound to a source property `Age3` that is of type `int`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text%2A>的下列屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>是資料繫結來源屬性`Age3`型別的`int`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule> checks for exceptions that are thrown during the update of the source property (such as when the user enters a value that cannot be converted to an integer).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>檢查 （例如，當使用者輸入的值無法轉換為整數） 之來源屬性更新期間所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: You can provide custom logic to handle those exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 您可以提供自訂邏輯以處理這些例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceExceptionFilter%2A> property to set an <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceExceptionFilterCallback>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceExceptionFilter%2A>屬性來設定<xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceExceptionFilterCallback>。

trans-unit.source: The following is an example implementation of an <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceExceptionFilterCallback>.
trans-unit.target: 以下是範例實作<xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceExceptionFilterCallback>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceExceptionFilterCallback> can also return `null`, the exception itself, or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceExceptionFilterCallback>也可以傳回`null`，本身的例外狀況或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceExceptionFilterCallback>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceExceptionFilterCallback>。

trans-unit.source: For the complete sample, see [Binding Validation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159972).
trans-unit.target: 如需完整範例，請參閱[繫結驗證範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159972)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines the timing of binding source updates.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會判斷繫結來源更新的時機。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger.Default" />, which returns the default <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger" /> value of the target dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<see cref="F:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger.Default" />，它會傳回預設<see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger" />目標相依性屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: However, the default value for most dependency properties is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger.PropertyChanged" />, while the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text" /> property has a default value of <see cref="F:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger.LostFocus" />.
trans-unit.target: 不過，大多數相依性屬性的預設值是<see cref="F:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger.PropertyChanged" />，雖然<see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text" />屬性具有預設值是<see cref="F:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger.LostFocus" />。

trans-unit.source: A programmatic way to determine the default <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger" /> value of a dependency property is to get the property metadata of the property using <see cref="M:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.GetMetadata(System.Type)" /> and then check the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.DefaultUpdateSourceTrigger" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷預設的程式設計方式<see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger" />相依性屬性的值是要取得的屬性使用的屬性中繼資料<see cref="M:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.GetMetadata(System.Type)" />然後核取的值<see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.DefaultUpdateSourceTrigger" />屬性。

trans-unit.source: Bindings that are <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.TwoWay> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.OneWayToSource> listen for changes in the target property and propagate them back to the source.
trans-unit.target: 繫結<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.TwoWay>或<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.OneWayToSource>接聽中的目標屬性的變更，並將它們傳播回來源。

trans-unit.source: This is known as updating the source.
trans-unit.target: 這種情況稱為更新來源。

trans-unit.source: Usually, these updates happen whenever the target property changes.
trans-unit.target: 通常，當目標屬性變更時，就可能發生這些更新。

trans-unit.source: This is fine for check boxes and other simple controls, but it is usually not appropriate for text fields.
trans-unit.target: 這是正常的核取方塊和其他簡單的控制項，但它通常不是適用於文字欄位。

trans-unit.source: Updating after every keystroke can diminish performance and it denies the user the usual opportunity to backspace and fix typing errors before committing to the new value.
trans-unit.target: 每個按鍵動作可能會降低效能，並拒絕使用者一般機會退格鍵並認可新的值之前修正輸入錯誤之後更新。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the default <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A> value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger.LostFocus> and not <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger.PropertyChanged>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，預設值<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A>值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger.LostFocus>而非<xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger.PropertyChanged>。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A> value to <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger.Explicit>, you must call the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression.UpdateSource%2A> method or the changes will not propagate back to the source.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A>值設定為<xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger.Explicit>，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression.UpdateSource%2A>方法或所做的變更將不會傳播到來源。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否要包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property provides an alternative to using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule> element explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性提供替代<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule>元素明確。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule> is a built-in validation rule that checks for errors that are raised by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo> implementation of the source object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule>是內建的驗證規則，以檢查所引發的錯誤<xref:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo>來源物件的實作。

trans-unit.source: If an error is raised, the binding engine creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError> with the error and adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection of the bound element.
trans-unit.target: 如果會引發錯誤，就會建立繫結引擎<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError>發生錯誤並將它加入<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>繫結項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: The lack of an error clears this validation feedback, unless another rule raises a validation issue.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤缺乏清除這個驗證回應，除非另一項規則會引發驗證問題。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnDataErrors%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnDataErrors%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [.NET Framework Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [.NET Framework 版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following examples uses <xref:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnDataErrors%2A> to validate user input in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnDataErrors%2A>來驗證使用者輸入中的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: The first example creates a data type that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo> to report validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 第一個範例會建立資料型別可實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo>報告驗證錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The following example binds the `Age` property to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> and sets <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnDataErrors%2A> to `true` on the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會繫結`Age`屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>並設定<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnDataErrors%2A>至`true`上<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>。

trans-unit.source: When the user enters an invalid value, a red border appears in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> reports the error message.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者輸入無效的值時，在出現紅色框線<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>報告的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否要包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property provides an alternative to using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule> element explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性提供替代<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>元素明確。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule> is a built-in validation rule that checks for exceptions that are thrown during the update of the source property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>是內建的驗證規則會檢查來源屬性更新期間所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown, the binding engine creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError> with the exception and adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection of the bound element.
trans-unit.target: 如果擲回例外狀況，就會建立繫結引擎<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError>與例外狀況並將它加入<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>繫結項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: The lack of an error clears this validation feedback, unless another rule raises a validation issue.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤缺乏清除這個驗證回應，除非另一項規則會引發驗證問題。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnExceptions%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnExceptions%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [.NET Framework Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [.NET Framework 版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following examples use <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnExceptions%2A> to validate user input in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnExceptions%2A>來驗證使用者輸入中的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: The first example creates a data type that throws an exception when the `Age` property is set to an invalid property.
trans-unit.target: 第一個範例會建立資料型別會擲回例外狀況時`Age`屬性設定為無效的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example binds the `Age` property to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> and sets <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnExceptions%2A> to `true` on the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會繫結`Age`屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>並設定<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnExceptions%2A>至`true`上<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>。

trans-unit.source: When the user enters an invalid value, a red border appears in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> reports the error message.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者輸入無效的值時，在出現紅色框線<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>報告的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.NotifyDataErrorValidationRule" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否要包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.NotifyDataErrorValidationRule" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.NotifyDataErrorValidationRule" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.NotifyDataErrorValidationRule" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnNotifyDataErrors%2A> is `true`, the binding checks for and reports errors that are raised by a data source that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnNotifyDataErrors%2A>是`true`，繫結檢查，並會報告所實作的資料來源所引發的錯誤<xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of rules that check the validity of the user input.
trans-unit.target: 取得檢查使用者輸入有效性的規則集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model enables you to associate <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A> with your <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> object.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]資料繫結模型可讓您將<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>與您<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>或<xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can create custom rules by deriving from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> class and implementing the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> method, or you can use the built-in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>, which invalidates a value if there are exceptions during source updates.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立自訂規則衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>類別，並實作<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A>方法，或者您可以使用內建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>，這會導致在來源更新期間的例外狀況是否無效值。

trans-unit.source: The binding engine checks each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> associated with a binding each time an input value (the binding target property value) is transferred to the binding source property.
trans-unit.target: 繫結引擎會檢查每個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>每次輸入的值 （繫結目標屬性值） 轉送到繫結來源屬性的繫結相關聯。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed discussion of the validation process, see the Data Validation section in the [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 驗證程序的詳細討論，請參閱中的資料驗證一節[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] only by using the collection syntax shown, or by accessing the collection object and using its various methods, such as `Add`.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性可以在設定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]只能使用集合語法所示，或藉由存取的集合物件，使用的各種方法，例如`Add`。

trans-unit.source: The property to access the collection object is read-only, whereas the collection itself is read-write.
trans-unit.target: 要存取的集合物件的屬性是唯讀的而集合本身則是讀寫。

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 屬性項目用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *oneOrMoreValidationRules*
trans-unit.target: *oneOrMoreValidationRules*

trans-unit.source: One or more <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> objects.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule> class or create custom rules by subclassing the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> class.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>類別或子類別化來建立自訂規則<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>類別。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.Binding.XmlNamespaceManager" /> attached property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.Binding.XmlNamespaceManager" /> 附加屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <see langword="XPath" /> query that returns the value on the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] binding source to use.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see langword="XPath" /> 查詢，以傳回 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] 繫結來源上要使用的值。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XPath" /> query.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="XPath" /> 查詢。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: When the binding source is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data instead of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] object, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.XPath%2A> property is used instead of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A> property to indicate the path to the value on the binding source to use.
trans-unit.target: 繫結來源時[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]資料，而非[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]物件<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.XPath%2A>而不是使用屬性<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A>屬性，指出要使用的繫結來源上的值的路徑。

trans-unit.source: By setting the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.XPath%2A> property, you are creating an `XPath` query to select a node or a collection of nodes (<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Xml.XmlAttribute?displayProperty=nameWithType> both derive from <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode?displayProperty=nameWithType>).
trans-unit.target: 藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.XPath%2A>屬性，您要建立`XPath`查詢，以選取的節點的集合 (<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Xml.XmlAttribute?displayProperty=nameWithType>兩者都衍生自<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode?displayProperty=nameWithType>)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode?displayProperty=nameWithType> is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] object, which means you can bind to its properties using the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode?displayProperty=nameWithType> 是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]物件，這表示您可以使用其屬性的繫結<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method handles the `XPath` expressions from the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.XPath%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會處理`XPath`運算式從<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.XPath%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: `XPath` functions are not supported.
trans-unit.target: `XPath` 不支援函式。

trans-unit.source: For `XPath` expression information, see the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A> documentation and some examples provided in the Example section.
trans-unit.target: 如`XPath`運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A>文件集和範例 > 一節中提供一些範例。

trans-unit.source: LINQ to XML objects <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument> and <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> do not use `XPath`.
trans-unit.target: LINQ to XML 物件<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>和<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>不要使用`XPath`。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [How to: Bind to XDocument, XElement, or LINQ for XML Query Results](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-bind-to-xdocument-xelement-or-linq-for-xml-query-results.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to: for XML 查詢結果繫結至 XDocument、 XElement 或 LINQ](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-bind-to-xdocument-xelement-or-linq-for-xml-query-results.md)。
